summary:
Determined individual with 20 years’ TV journalism and production experience, of which last five years in producing news and current affairs programs and documentaries for BBC World Service and Sesame Workshop. As an Executive Producer, capable of creating and leading an engaged production workforce to deliver quality media productions. 

Skilled in producing small to large scale TV series. Have up-to-date knowledge and experience in all types of audio visual production. Have good understanding of new media, live broadcasting and latest production technologies.
Have strong knowledge of news and current affairs production. Credible authority for leading live media production team ensuring high quality. Have experience in making Investigative show, talk show and documentaries. 
Due to having work experience and up-to-date knowledge in media production, capable of taking classes for Media Studies and Journalism related studies.
